item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>My favourite Steven Wright one-liner:</p><p>"I took the lift down 28 floors today...it was real heavy"</p>
item.content:encoded:
My favourite Steven Wright one-liner:

“I took the lift down 28 floors today…it was real heavy”

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>Glad you have had a good week -we are having an evening meal on Sunday and the offer to come is still open!!</p>
item.content:encoded: Glad you have had a good week -we are having an evening meal on Sunday and the offer to come is still open!!
